name: BabyFirstCleengLogin
description: A plugin for Cleeng login and subscription

custom_configuration_fields.tooltip_text: The Cleeng publisher id
Flag to indicate if to present the plugin on app launch
The action to launch the plugin with. Can be one of 3 options: sign_up, sign_in or subscriptions_list. Default: sign_in
Client help url. Can be web url or iOS deep-linking url to open Phone/Messages/Mail default iOS app
Flag to indicate if login/signup to Cleeng with Facebook is available
Flag to indicate if AppStore purchase restore available
Text for details on sign up screen. For example: Please enter your details to create an account:
Text for sign in button. For example: Sign in with SIGN IN
Text for Facebook sign in button. For example: Sign in with Facebook
Text for Email text field placeholder. For example: Email
Text for Password text field placeholder. For example: Password
Text for Reset password email text field placeholder. For example: Email
Text for no account description on sign in view. For example: Don't have an account?
Text for no account action on sign in view. For example: Sign Up
Text for restore description on sign up/in view. For example: If you already purchased an account
Text for restore action on sign up/in view. For example: Restore
Text for restore view title. For example: Restore Your Account

Text for restore view subtitle. For example: In order to restore your account
please provide the details
you registered with:
Text for restore button. For example: RESTORE
Text for restore help description. For example: Having a trouble?
Text for restore help action. For example: Contact Us
Text for Sign up view description. For example: Please enter your details:
Text for sign up button. For example: SIGN UP
Text for already have an account action on sign up view. For example: Sign In
Text for already have an account description on sign up view. For example: Already have an account?
Text for alternative label between sign up/in & Facebook buttons. For example: - OR -
Text for reset password view title. For example: Reset Your Password
Text for reset password view subtitle. For example: Enter you email to reset your password:
Text for reset password description in sign in view. For example: Forgot your password?
Text for reset password description in sign in view. For example: Reset
Text for reset password button. For example: RESET PASSWORD
Text for IAP-s view title. For example: Choose Your Subscription
Text for IAP-s view legal. For example: Payment will charged to iTunes account at confirmation of purchase
Text for login confirmation action button. For example: Congratulations!
Text for login confirmation alert message. For example: You are successfully subscribed to this channel. Enjoy!!!
Text for login confirmation action button. For example: OK
Text for reset password email sent. For example: Please check you email for further instructions
Text for subscribe button action. For example: SUBSCRIBE FOR
Text for alert cancel button. For example: Cancel
Text for alert contact us button. For example: Contact Us
Text for alert retry button. For example: Retry
Text for alert ok button. For example: OK
Text for internal alert title. For example: Error
Text for internal alert message. For example: Something went wrong
Text for alert title presented when user enters invalid email. For example: Invalid Email
Text for alert message presented when user enters invalid email. For example: The email you entered isn't a valid email address
Text for alert title presented when user didn't enter email. For example: Email Required
Text for alert message presented when user didn't enter email. For example: Please enter your email
Text for alert title presented when user didn't enter password. For example: Password Required
Text for alert message presented when user didn't enter password. For example: Please enter your password
Text for alert title presented when Cleeng api returns error code 10
Text for alert message presented when Cleeng api returns error code 10
Text for alert title presented when Cleeng api returns error code 11
Text for alert message presented when Cleeng api returns error code 11
Text for alert title presented when Cleeng api returns error code 12
Text for alert message presented when Cleeng api returns error code 12
Text for alert title presented when Cleeng api returns error code 13
Text for alert message presented when Cleeng api returns error code 13
Text for alert title presented when Cleeng api returns error code 15
Text for alert message presented when Cleeng api returns error code 15
Text for alert title presented when user made login with Facebook without granting email permission
Text for alert message presented when user made login with Facebook without granting email permission
Map of offers id to tag localized (in Subscriptions view). For example: offerId1=BEST OFFER;offerId3=10% OFF
Text for alert message when no IAP purchases to restore with. For example: No previous purchases to restore
Flag to indicate if coupons is available or not
Text for coupon action button in Subscriptions view
Text for title in coupon view
Text for details in coupon view
Text for coupon placeholder in coupon view
Text for coupon action button in coupon view
Text for coupon success message
Text for coupon alert message when no alert message returns from web-service
